thread.title: U.S. stocks open lower as Apple losses weigh
thread.title_full: U.S. stocks open lower as Apple losses weigh - MarketWatch

author: By     Anora Mahmudova
title: U.S. stocks open lower as Apple losses weigh
text:
U.S. stocks opened lower on Wednesday, weighed down by losses in Apple shares following disappointing results. The iPhone maker's shares tumbled 5.4%, shaving off about 5 points off the S&P 500, while the 1.8% drop in the technology sector is mostly attributed to the decline in the stock. The S&P 500 SPX, -0.22% opened 7 points, or 0.3%, lower at 2,112. The Nasdaq Composite COMP, -0.67% dropped 49 points, or 1%, to 5,158. The Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, -0.43% began the day down 46 points, or 0.3%, to 17,870.
Read the full story: Appleâ€™s slide pulls down S&P 500; U.S. stocks lower
